desc.cn: Tidy Viewer (tv) 是一种跨平台 CSV 漂亮的打印机，它使用列造型来最大化观看者的享受
desc.en: Tidy Viewer (tv) is a cross-platform csv pretty printer that uses column styling to maximize viewer enjoyment

/cargo.cmd:
cargo install tidy-viewer
&& sudo cp /home/$USER/.cargo/bin/tidy-viewer /usr/local/bin/.
&& echo "alias tv='tidy-viewer'" >> ~/.bashrc
&& source ~/.bashrc

debian/wget.cmd:
wget https://github.com/alexhallam/tv/releases/download/<VERSION>/tidy-viewer_<VERSION>_amd64.deb
&& sudo dpkg -i tidy-viewer_<VERSION>_amd64.deb
&& echo "alias tv='tidy-viewer'" >> ~/.bashrc
&& source ~/.bashrc
